author: Zak Cheney-Rice
title: Rikers Island Reports Its First COVID-Related Prisoner Death
description: Michael Tyson, 53, had been locked up for a noncriminal, technical parole violation.
content: The first COVID-related death of a Rikers Island prisoner was announced on Sunday, when Michael Tyson, 53, succumbed at a local hospital, the New York Times reports. Hed been removed from the jail complex for treatment on March 26; he was locked up on Februar… [+4041 chars]
